long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReQorder is a screen-recording software platform that allows users to record virtually anything: Co-browsing sessions, demos, presentations, or even chat conversations. It is an adaptable solution for Screen Recording that provides an API Driven Platform which can be integrated into any Oracle CX Cloud Platform or any other existing product/solution.
